description: Detects scheduled task creations or modification on a suspicious schedule type
false_positives: Legitmate processes that run at logon. Filter according to your environment
name: Suspicious Schtasks Schedule Types
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\schtasks.exe OR winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"schtasks.exe") AND process.command_line.text:(*\ ONLOGON\ * OR *\ ONSTART\ * OR *\ ONCE\ * OR *\ ONIDLE\ *)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:(*NT\ AUT* OR *\ SYSTEM* OR *HIGHEST*)))))
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali
